task: Search for a hotel in Lisbon with airport shuttle, rated 8.5 or above, available for a six-night stay from April 1 to April 7, 2025, for two adults, breakfast included. Current date is: 2025-01-05.
user_action_and_explanation:
Changing URL parameters. The task is to search for a hotel in Lisbon with specific requirements such as having an airport shuttle, a review rating of 8.5 or above, for a six-night stay from April 1 to April 7, 2025, for two adults, with breakfast included. The proposed URL is designed to fulfill these criteria.
- `ss=Lisbon`: Searches in the location Lisbon.
- `checkin_year_month_monthday=2025-04-01`: Sets the check-in date to April 1, 2025.
- `checkout_year_month_monthday=2025-04-07`: Sets the check-out date to April 7, 2025.
- `group_adults=2`: Specifies the number of adults as two.
- `order=bayesian_review_score`: Orders results based on review scores to prioritize the desired rating.
- `facilities=24,107,2`: Filters results to only show those with an airport shuttle and breakfast included.
- `review_score=85`: Filters to show results with an 8.5 (85 in URL parameters) or higher review score.
This URL will efficiently showcase available options that match the search criteria.
observation: Went to https://www.booking.com/searchresults.html?ss=Lisbon&checkin_year_month_monthday=2025-04-01&checkout_year_month_monthday=2025-04-07&group_adults=2&no_rooms=1&sb_travel_purpose=leisure&order=bayesian_review_score&lbs_max_price=&to_bathroom=&to_cost=price_for_dates_b&to_room_search=&wlsd=0&facilities=24,107,2&review_score=85
